pr_title: [no ticket][risk=no] Did I say Attachments? I meant Tags.

timeline.message: Fox in mocks our game is done sir
merge master && switch set to list to match view.create signature

timeline.bodyText: Everything else was incremented to _2, but this was incremented to _3. Who should know about why this metric is different from all the others?
timeline.author: gjuggler

replies.bodyText:
These are all going to get scrapped at least one more time, so I didn't invest in consistency or name conventions yet. I need to circulate a convention where we have a way to give versions to the metric descriptors.
It appears that registering (in OpenCensus) a view corresponding to an existing metric is a no-op if that metric is actually live, but the Google api fails with a "metric exists" error if the metric has been deleted. Still sorting this out a bit.
replies.author: jaycarlton
